exception.name: ErrorLimitOfSimultaneousOpenTransactionsReached
exception.description: This exception is thrown by the SE API function startTransaction if the maximum number of simultaneously open transaction managed by the device has been reached.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorLimitOfSimultaneousOpenTransactionsReached that is thrown by the SE API function startTransaction if the maximum number of simultaneously open transaction managed by the device has been reached.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when attempting to start a transaction after reaching maximum concurrent transaction limit
